Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists in the fourth quarter.
Anthony Davis scored 31 points and made a key 3-pointer with 37 seconds left to secure the win.
Domantas Sabonis had a triple-double with 29 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists in the loss.
Pre-Game Insights: JJ Redick has found success early as an NBA coach with the Lakers off to a 3-0 start.
Post-Match Reflections: James made a long 3-pointer in the fourth quarter, capping an 8-0 run to give the Lakers a 101-94 lead.
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship.
